name: Nanachi Breach- (SCP:CB 0.2 Mod)
description:
Here's a remake of an old SCP:CB mod I created during 2019.

This is for all the Nanachi fans to play. :>

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keep in mind, that this game is a modified version of an old and outdated SCP:CB build. I had to do it, since the classic versions of SCP:CB are much more scarier.

This mod is also in pretty early development, so expect some things to be changed in later builds.
